descriptions.meaning_e: to train to provide knowledge or skill
descriptions.sentence:
Sophia was ________ at a private school.
소피아는 사립학교에서 교육받았다.

descriptions.meaning_e: an area where few people live
descriptions.sentence:
This is the last piece of untouched __________.
여기가 훼손되지 않은 마지막 황무지다.

descriptions.meaning_e: an event during which something happens
descriptions.sentence:
That is an _______ in my life that I want to forget.
그것은 내 인생에서 잊고 싶은 사건이다.

descriptions.meaning_e: to give someone what they need or want
descriptions.sentence:
Trees _______ us with healthier neighborhoods.
나무는 우리에게 더 건강한 주변 환경을 제공한다.

descriptions.meaning_e: to make someone agree to do something
descriptions.sentence:
She _________ him to come home before 9 p.m.
그녀는 밤 9시 전까지 집에 오라고 그를 설득했다.

descriptions.meaning_e: a person who works in an office for another person
descriptions.sentence:
The boss asked his _________ to let him know his next appointment.
그 사장은 비서에게 다음 약속을 알려 달라고 요청했다.

________ she is scared of heights, Kelly loves going climbing.
켈리는 높은 곳을 무서워하지만 등산을 좋아한다.

descriptions.meaning_e: a book containing facts on many topics
descriptions.sentence:
I looked up the writer in the online ____________.
나는 온라인 백과사전에서 그 작가에 대해 찾아보았다.

descriptions.meaning_e: a group of officials who represent their country in a foreign country
descriptions.sentence:
I called the _______ because I lost my passport.
나는 여권을 잃어버려서 대사관에 전화했다.

descriptions.meaning_e: to accept or start to use something new
descriptions.sentence:
The government _______ a new method to solve environmental problems.
정부는 환경 문제를 해결하기 위해 새로운 방법을 도입했다.

descriptions.meaning_e: to take another person's child into one's family
descriptions.sentence:
Sally and her husband became parents when they _______ a baby girl.
샐리와 그녀의 남편이 한 여자 아기를 입양했을 때 그들은 부모가 되었다.
